Articles.Content:
Hello! I'm Sakyamoney(rkfnql322) from korean forum. And this is my first part.

Well, You guys must have experienced blow up by over heating under the atmosphere.
That's really annoying. Also, overheating in the atmosphere prevent you from using max-throttle. sadfijoasifijksdolsaijdfo!!!!!.
Now, here comes ridiculous high-tech fire extinguisher that cools down your engine.
With this attached on any part of craft, Your DIAMOND kerbals will cool down the engine with this. LOL
You can find my model here.
Thanks to PrivateFlip for perfect script.

This is not finished yet. Next update will brought to you with bug-fix, enhanced realistic cfg and function added.

Actually, My part was on newly updated mod list until yesterday but some craftszero-download stole my position. It made me sad.
Or just put a pancake tank between the orange tank and the main sail. Problem solved.

Or just put a pancake tank between the orange tank and the main sail. Problem solved.

True but what would really be neat is a plugin that would give you only a limited amount of coolant before it starts to overheat that way you could only go so far with it. Also add smoke effect to the extinguisher would be awesome.
It would be cool if it had a particle effect to show that it was being used. You could make it work as an engine that produces no thrust and makes the same exhaust smoke as the LV-1 engine.

This is amazing, rated 5 stars!

I'd love to see this on a mounting rack part, or maybe you can have it decouple on its own, so it doesn't need an ugly decoupler

EDIT: This guy needs more credit!

EDIT EDIT: Uh, this may have got reposted because of the new Delete function, it's hard to use.

This is amazing, rated 5 stars!

I'd love to see this on a mounting rack part, or maybe you can have it decouple on its own, so it doesn't need an ugly decoupler

EDIT: This guy needs more credit!

EDIT EDIT: Uh, this may have got reposted because of the new Delete function, it's hard to use.

Thanks I'll consider that.

It would be cool if it had a particle effect to show that it was being used. You could make it work as an engine that produces no thrust and makes the same exhaust smoke as the LV-1 engine.

Yeap. Will be added very soon.

Now with KAS mod!!!

Edit note

-KAS mod compatibility. Can be stored, grabbed, attached(even on the helmet of other kerbal).

-Coordinate fix.

-Code stability increased.

-Now extinguisher uses Extinguisher Powder. also added as a new resource.

Can be downloaded here.

Edited October 26, 2013 by rkfnql322

"Saky DSTÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s masterpiece. Thanks to the sensor technology, especially Ã¢â‚¬ËœThermodynamicsÃ¢â‚¬â„¢, Kerbals now donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t need to be scared by overheated engines.
This tiny scarlet extinguisher will keep engineÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s temperature at 500Ã‚ÂºC. DonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t forget to activate it manually. This part can be turn on/off with right click or action group."

This part&plugin is built to cool down the overheated engines. Just attach the extinguisher on any part of the ship and activate it.
When engine's temperature heats up more than 50%, It will start working. While Extinguisher working, Engine will not overheat more than 50%.
Recently updated involves KAS compatibility fix, so you will be able to grab it, attach it on the other ship or even on the other Kerbal.
However code has a sound code and smoke code but it will be not available until the model fixed.(Maybe after my application to university.)

plz enjoy my mod and have fun.
